disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Rage Gene.

blurb.value: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

description.value: Innate - Mini Gnar: While in Mini Gnar form, Gnar gains  bonus movement speed,  attack range, attack speed growth and  attack speed.

leveling.value: Bonus Movespeed:»0 −  20 (based on level)«Total Movespeed:335 − 355 (based on level)Bonus Range:0 − 100 (based on level)

description2.value: Innate - Rage Gene: Mini Gnar generates 4 / 7 / 11 (based on level) Rage over 2 seconds upon dealing or receiving damage. Against non-champions, basic attacks and Boomerang Throw instantly generate「 0.5 / 0.875 / 1.375 (based on level) Rage. 」「 12.5% of the amount. 」 Against champions, Boomerang Throw instantly generates「 1 / 1.75 / 2.75 (based on level) Rage, 」「 25% of the amount, 」and basic attacks instantly generate「 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 (based on level). 」「 50% of the amount. 」 Boomerang Throw can only generate Rage once per cast, and grants Rage based on the first enemy hit. Gnar's Rage decays if he has not dealt or taken damage in the last 13 seconds.

description3.value: At maximum Rage, casting an ability or after 4 seconds will transform Mini Gnar into Mega Gnar for 15 seconds, during which Gnar's Rage depletes. Afterwards Gnar returns to Mini Gnar and is too tired to generate Rage for 15 seconds. Gnar retains his  current percentage health when he returns to Mini Gnar.

description4.value: Innate - Mega Gnar: Mega Gnar has different abilities, although they share Mini Gnar's ability cooldowns. While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar loses all of Mini Gnar's buffs and instead has increased  base AD,  base health,  base armor, and  base magic resistance. Gnar restores  health equal to the increase.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The Rage generated upon dealing or receiving damage occurs over 2 seconds with 4 ticks every 0.5 seconds. It also does not stack but instead refreshes with subsequent applications (of dealing or receiving damage). The bonus rage generation on basic attacks counts as an on-hit effect, and is triggered by Runaan's Hurricane and Guinsoo's Rageblade. In-game, the value on the Rage bar always displays rounded down to the nearest integer. Mega Gnar's gained health is not affected by healing modifiers such as Grievous Wounds and those from items and runes. When returning to Mini Gnar, Gnar will only retain his current health percentage, not current health total. This is intentional to prevent Gnar from simply triggering Rage Gene in order to heal himself over time. Gnar's abilities share  cooldowns across forms. The final stats, after Rage Gene being applied, can be seen on Mini Gnar's and Mega Gnar's respective data template, in the front page. Mini Gnar gains 5.5% − 99% (based on level) bonus attack speed. Mega Gnar gains 100 − 831 (based on level) base health, 3.5 − 54.5 (based on level) base armor, 3.5 − 63 (based on level) base magic resistance, and 6 − 48.5 (based on level) base attack damage
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Boomerang Throw.

blurb.value: Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

description.value: Active: Gnar throws a boomerang in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage and slows enemies hit for 2 seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar in a fixed line after reaching its maximum range or hitting an enemy, dealing 50% damage to subsequent targets.

description2.value: Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang while it is returning back refunds 40% of its  maximum cooldown.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* The boomerang return direction is determined by which direction Gnar is heading, and is calculated at the apex of its flight.
 Since the cooldown between the two is shared, Mini Gnar may pick up a boulder and/or Mega Gnar may catch a boomerang.
 Boomerang Throw is always cast at the original casting position.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hyper.

blurb.value: Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

description.value: Passive: Every third attack or ability on the same target within 3.5 seconds deals bonus magic damage and grants Gnar 30 / 45 / 60 / 75% (based on GNAR!'s rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds. The damage is capped at 300 (+ 100% AP) against monsters.

leveling.value: Bonus Magic Damage:10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 (+ 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14% of target's maximum health) (+ 100% AP)

description2.value: Gnar gains Hyper's  bonus movement speed when he leaves Mega form.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The bonus movement speed's duration refreshes whenever Gnar would receive it (by hitting a target three times again). PENDING FOR TEST: Hyper's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hop.

blurb.value: Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

description.value: Active: Gnar leaps to a target location, gaining  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.

description2.value: If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce 525 units further in the same direction.

description3.value: Landing on an enemy deals them physical damage and slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.

description4.value: Gnar will not bounce if he's immobilized during the first leap.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Hop does not allow Gnar to bounce off wards.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from GNAR!.

blurb.value: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

description.value: Mini Gnar - Passive: Increases Hyper's  bonus movement speed.

description2.value: Mega Gnar - Active: Gnar knocks back nearby enemies up to 590 units in the target direction, dealing physical damage and slowing them by 45% after a 0.4-second delay.

leveling2.value: Physical Damage:»200 / 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 100% AP)«Increased Damage:300 / 375 / 450 / 525 / 600 (+ 75% bonus AD) (+ 150% AP)

description3.value: Enemies that collide with terrain take 50% bonus damage instantly and are stunned instead of slowed.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * GNAR!'s active interacts with player-created terrain ( Crystallize, Emperor's Divide, Cataclysm, Pillar of Ice).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
